architectural_notes: Global pending canister-call state should drive a persistent 'connecting' toast; toast auto-dismisses on successful reconnect/connection.

existing_features.title: Add a global toast notification that appears whenever any canister call is pending and the backend actor is not available, and keep the toast visible until the actor reconnects, then auto-dismiss it.

Detect and treat the "Actor not available" failure state as a reconnect condition by showing the same persistent reconnect toast when React Query operations fail with an Error whose message includes "Actor not available", and keep it visible until the actor is available again.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show a toast notification whenever any canister call is pending; keep it visible until the connection/reconnect succeeds, then auto-dismiss.

projectName: Persistent reconnect toast while canister calls are pending
